name: BMM_DEFINITIONS
documentation: Definitions used by all BMM packages.

Bmm_internal_version.name: Bmm_internal_version
Bmm_internal_version.documentation: Current internal version of BMM meta-model, used to determine if a given schema can be processed by a given implementation of the model.

Schema_name_delimiter.name: Schema_name_delimiter
Schema_name_delimiter.documentation: Delimiter used to separate schema id from package path in a fully qualified path.

Package_name_delimiter.name: Package_name_delimiter
Package_name_delimiter.documentation: Delimiter used to separate package names in a package path.

Type_delimiter.name: Type_delimiter
Type_delimiter.documentation: Appears between a name and a type in a declaration or type signature.

Generic_left_delimiter.name: Generic_left_delimiter
Generic_left_delimiter.documentation: Left delimiter for generic class and generic type names, as used in `List<T>`.

Generic_right_delimiter.name: Generic_right_delimiter
Generic_right_delimiter.documentation: Right delimiter for generic class and generic type names, as used in `List<T>`.

Generic_constraint_delimiter.name: Generic_constraint_delimiter
Generic_constraint_delimiter.documentation: Delimiter between formal type parameter and constraint type, as used in `Sortable<T: Ordered>`.

Tuple_left_delim.name: Tuple_left_delim

Tuple_right_delim.name: Tuple_right_delim
Tuple_right_delim.documentation: Right delimiter of a Tuple type and also instance.

Tuple_separator.name: Tuple_separator
Tuple_separator.documentation: Separator used in Tuple types and instances.

Constraint_left_delim.name: Constraint_left_delim
Constraint_left_delim.documentation: Left delimiter used in serial form of instance constrained enumeration.

Constraint_right_delim.name: Constraint_right_delim
Constraint_right_delim.documentation: Right delimiter used in serial form of instance constrained enumeration.

Metadata_bmm_version.name: Metadata_bmm_version
Metadata_bmm_version.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'bmm_version' in .bmm schema file.

Metadata_schema_name.name: Metadata_schema_name
Metadata_schema_name.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'schema_name' in .bmm schema file.

Metadata_rm_publisher.name: Metadata_rm_publisher
Metadata_rm_publisher.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'rm_publisher' in .bmm schema file.

Metadata_rm_release.name: Metadata_rm_release
Metadata_rm_release.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'rm_release' in .bmm schema file.

Metadata_schema_revision.name: Metadata_schema_revision
Metadata_schema_revision.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'schema_revision' in .bmm schema file.

Metadata_schema_lifecycle_state.name: Metadata_schema_lifecycle_state
Metadata_schema_lifecycle_state.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'schema_lifecycle_state' in .bmm schema file.

Metadata_schema_description.name: Metadata_schema_description
Metadata_schema_description.documentation: Attribute name of logical attribute 'schema_description' in .bmm schema file.

Any_class.name: Any_class
Any_class.documentation: built-in class definition corresponding to the top `Any' class.

Any_type.name: Any_type
Any_type.documentation: Built-in type definition corresponding to the top `Any' type.

create_schema_id.name: create_schema_id
create_schema_id.documentation:
Create schema id, formed from:

`a_model_publisher '-' a_schema_name '-' a_model_release`

e.g. `openehr_rm_1.0.3`, `openehr_test_1.0.1`, `iso_13606_1_2008_2.1.2`.
